divs: Sighting DetailsWe just saw 6 of this spheres or balls .. they are black following a north path . We get to see 6 of them with a 5 min interval between. .. Too far and still visible to naked eye to be a party balloon. I used my telescope visor to find what it was but still cant see exactly any definition. Hope to find more pp looking at the sky and seeing this
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Hialeah
There were no other sightings in Hialeah on or around May 11th 2013
